summary: Detective Pikachu: ecco a voi il nuovo trailer!
title: Detective Pikachu: ecco a voi il nuovo trailer!
body:
Detective Pikachu: ecco a voi il nuovo trailer!

Ieri Ryan Reynolds ci aveva fatto piegare in due dalle risate, con il suo video in cui mostra quanto si sia dedicato per interpretare questo incredibile personaggio, e quest’oggi vi riportiamo il nuovissimo trailer ufficiale per uno dei film più attesi dei prossimi mesi, ovvero Detective Pikachu, pellicola che traspone per la prima volta in live-action i Pokémon che noi abbiamo tanto amato…

View On WordPress

summary: > nintendo announces pokemon direct for tomorrow morning > detective pikachu happens to release a new trailer few hours after...
body:
> nintendo announces pokemon direct for tomorrow morning

> detective pikachu happens to release a new trailer few hours after direct announcement

> new trailer has eevee evolving into flareon in front of dialga, palkia, and arceus statues

> sinnoh remakes confirmed

but there is a difference between having an easy game and having a games explains every detail to you when it’s not needed
summary: In all honesty, the biggest thing i want out of gen 8 is to make the handholdy tutorials optional so I don’t have to have every...
body:
In all honesty, the biggest thing i want out of gen 8 is to make the handholdy tutorials optional so I don’t have to have every minute element of series i have been playing for years explained to me

I understand that it’s for new players and younger kids, but there are ways to make the game easier and more accessible to them without alienating older players for a decent chunk of the game

like just allow players to skip it by pressing a button

title: Pokemon Direct Announced For February 27
body:
Pokemon Direct Announced For February 27! #Pokemon #Switch #Nintendo

A Nintendo Direct presentation was announced today that will focus on Pokemon and promises to give us at least 7 minutes of new information, Nintendo revealed today via Twitter today.

The Pokemon-themed Direct or Pokemon Direct as Nintendo is calling is, is scheduled to air on Wednesday, February 27 at 6 AM PT / 9 AM EA / 2 PM GMT. More information on what will be revealed during this…

View On WordPress

summary: Me, returning from Newfoundland: Ah, that was refreshing. Time to relax today and get to work on modeling on Wednesday, no...
body:
Me, returning from Newfoundland: Ah, that was refreshing. Time to relax today and get to work on modeling on Wednesday, no distractions

Nintendo: Hey seven minutes of Pokemon Direct, with us having teased a main series game for 2019 and implying massive changes to the franchise. On Wednesday.

Game Freak/Creatures: Hey we just filed a trademark for Alter Genesis which may or may not be the “Town” game we talked about a few Directs ago, and we do this just before this Pokemon Direct on Wednesday

Me, my work abandoned, staring at Nintendo Direct’s website until tomorrow afternoon:

blog.name: smilingperformer
blog.title: Smiling Performer
blog.description: A side-blog managed by @Keep-on-trying. Dedicated to Pokémon gifs, photos, art and analyses, both anime and games alike. Enjoy your stay! ~ Adores Amour- & WaterWarriorshipping, enjoys pretty much all seasons!

summary: Time for gen 7 appreciation post, now that Pokemon Direct is tomorrow and it can reveal Gen 8 for us there! Who knows! Anywho,...
body:
Time for gen 7 appreciation post, now that Pokemon Direct is tomorrow and it can reveal Gen 8 for us there! Who knows! Anywho, I’ll start:

I’m very thankful for Alola region.
I loved the gameplay so much in SM and USUM.
I loved the atmosphere in the region a whole, whole lot!
I ADORED the fashion and the hairstyles! The customisation! ♥
The music during this gen’s games and pokeani is absolutely gorgeus and I still put it to play as playlist from time to time!
The starters are all adorable and I love them!
I love the Pokémon in this gen so much!
I love Alola forms so darn lot.
The characters in Alola are so memorable for me.
It’s the generation that got me into Pokémon.
The anime series is my absolute favourite and also got me to be a Pokeani fan! (plus, convinced me to visit all of it!)
My love and admire for Lana/Suiren the Water Trial Captain grew stronger and stronger and will never falter!
I got to experience Kanto, finally!
My love for Eevee grew tenfold.
I found tons of favourite Pokémon in this generation.

There’s so much I love about Alola and gen 7 as a whole, I’m so happy I decided to try out Sun & Moon demo on my 3DS 2 years ago, and I’m so happy to have become a fan, and see the next gen become a reality!

Here’s to another great generation guys!

blog.name: tigerlover16-uk
blog.title: Tiger Lover 16-UK
blog.description: Jack Humphreys, Age 24, From Wales. I'm a Christian, animal lover, an animation fan and a gigantic nerd. Fan of Spider-man, Dragon Ball, DC and Marvel Comics, MLP, Harry Potter and a variety of other shows, movies, comics and books. I'm just here to have fun, do some good and talk about the things i like (And sometimes the stuff I don't).

summary: *Watching new Detective Pikachu trailer on twitter* Okay, so far so good. Now I hope they don’t do anything stupid like give...
body:
*Watching new Detective Pikachu trailer on twitter*

Okay, so far so good. Now I hope they don’t do anything stupid like give away the appearance of a plot-relevant Pokémon that they should probably save as a surprise for when we actually watch the-

*A certain legendary Pokémon cameos near the end of the trailer*

… … you just couldn’t help yourselves, could you.

reblog.comment:

… … you just couldn’t help yourselves, could you.
